## UnicodeUtils.isRtlMirrored() function

Checks if a character should be mirrored on an RTL run.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function isRtlMirrored(codePoint: number): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  codePoint | number | Character's Unicode code point. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

Result of the test.
